name: PHP-Based Web Page
summary: Learn about .PHTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PHP pages may also use the .PHTML extension, though the standard .PHP extension is the most common.

description: Web page that contains PHP code; parsed by a PHP engine on the Web server, which dynamically generates HTML that is sent to the client's browser; often used for accessing database information.
